entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tier0 castclass pattern allocates #90965
    9.0.0
  • ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance becomes expensive during the Get cached RCW scenario when called from multiple threads #90964
    9.0.0
  • Internal CLR error (0x80131506) when running IBC collection #90962
  • NativeAOT: ILLink substitutions are evaluated multiple times #90958
  • Regression: Mono Android amd64: condition `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' not met #90955
  • Known issue: NuGet "FatalProtocolException : Unable to load the service index" #90951
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.SEHException blocking runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect pipeline #90947
  • System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests failing with "Exit code was 1 but it should have been 42" #90945
  • JIT assert "(structBaseType != TYP_STRUCT) && (genTypeSize(structBaseType) >= originalSize)" failing in superpmi-collect #90944
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent Exceptions for ReadOnlyMemory.Slice #90939
  • dotnet dump no longer working on OSX #90938
    9.0.0
  • [Feature Request]Allow MetricEventSource to expose the set of metrics configured by the app #90923
    9.0.0
  • [GeneratedComInterface] in RCW-only mode produces CA2256 warning #90922
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90919
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "Add a head merging transformation" #90929
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort #90933
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "Remove AO from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef" #90931
    8.0.0
  • AspNetCore.App runtime 6.0.21 uninstalls version 6.0.20 #90914
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator uses highest installed .NET Runtime, generates C# code incompatible with the SDK of the referencing project #90913
  • Config binder generator generates uncompilable code when a private nested type is used #90909
    8.0.0
  • Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #90908
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.TryParse allocates on some failure paths #90907
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch When measuring small time periods #90788
    9.0.0
  • ConfigureHttpClientDefaults isn't an extension method in the reference assembly #90911
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #86887
    8.0.0
  • Call stack is not as expected if a method is called at last line in caller #90921
  • BDN randomly crashes on Linux? #90691
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90082
    9.0.0
  • AddMetrics can initialize MetricsSubscriptionManager multiple times #90779
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests timeout in CI #90874
    9.0.0
  • [Question] Ref reassignment #90925
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts Prohibits using DbgShim from NuGet package #90187
  • Android: new cil-strip feature causes app crashes #88538
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\superpmi\\superpmicollect\\superpmicollect.cmd #90711
    8.0.0
  • Incomplete type errors in lldb/gdb when when using clang-13 or newer #90791
    9.0.0
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectory is unable to extract tar archives with hard links. #87463
    Future
  • Slow startup on Linux #79206
    Future
  • Too much Gen0 memory usage on Region GC #82416
    Future
  • Blazor unhandled error bar appears when testing various mobile sizes from Chromium mobile simulators #84172
    8.0.0
  • The size calculated to be negative and cause Access Violation when doing vxsort vectorized_partition #86548
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #90967
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90966
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [release/8.0] Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90963
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - use `stable` version of `v8` #90961
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker Substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90956
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Disable RemoteExecutor SearchValues tests on LinuxBionic #90954
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Delete duplicate init-distro-rid.sh #90952
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90950
    area-Build-mono
  • SendRecv_Stream_TCP: also timeout send/receive, escape xunit sync context #90949
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90941
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90936
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Only initialize listeners once #90932
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90924
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90912
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #90948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Slightly reduce the Depth3Test that often times out on Linux #90777
    test-failure, os-linux, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90934
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Treat *.lss files as plain text in .gitattributes #90940
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90833
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.Extensions.Http.cs #90920
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90930
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce startup overhead from jiterp thread safety #90928
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90487
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Only initialize listeners once #90902
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] Fix queue count in rate limiters #90878
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add chrome versions to PR title, and labels #90889
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests build #90927
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.Extensions.Http.cs #90916
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary "return 100"s from tests #89550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SPMI issue in getHelperFtn #90888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update (remove most) most of CLRTestKind, GenerateRunScript, RestorePackages #89696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] runtime: Fix creating the stack trace for a ManagedError #89905
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid PGO optimization path on Nuget cache containing spaces. #90729
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Generate exports list for the linker on wasi-wasm #2385
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Produce reactor when compiling OutputType Library on wasi-wasm #2384
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] DllImport / LibraryImport doesn't automatically produce imports on wasi-wasm #2383

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASI fixes #2386
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Clean up the usage document #2382

Updated

  • ManagedZLib: Porting Deflate from C ZLib #2367
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite exception handling to support nested dispatch #2374

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding test for ToolPackageDownloader in sdk #34847
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    .NET 8.0
  • [API Compat] Add extension method validation #34824
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.Metrics to the list of default usings for ASP.NET Core applications #34813
  • [Repo] Add automatic style/formatting mechanism #34810

Closed

  • Non-descriptive error on .NET Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers deploy DN8.P6 #34329

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dependabot.yml to target 8.0.1xx #34848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34845
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Make UseRidGraph property map to runtime config option #34836
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34819
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix typo in StaticWebAsset.cs #34818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #34840
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, .NET 8.0
  • [main] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture comparison to match product #34843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture comparison to match product #34838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] add note about supporting identity token auth for containers in .NET 8 #34718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34734
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged

Updated

  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34788
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Make illink error less specific #34806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • CultureNotFoundException: Culture is not supported. (Parameter 'culture') 4096 (0x1000) is an invalid culture identifier. #7483

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS0021 error (Cannot apply indexing with [] to an expression of type) appears incorrectly on code that compiles #69663
  • The `/embed` option allows for untracked inputs to the compilation #69661
    17.9
  • The /embed option does not allow for portable builds with line directive targets #69659
  • Web Application with specific config not analysed by MsBuildWorkspace #69654

Closed

  • ExtractInterfaceCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled. #68971
  • Captured primary constructor parameters should be hidden from intellisense. #69300
    17.8 P3
  • Semantic snippets: type snippets should have different valid modifiers #69599
  • An assert is fired in NullableWalker for scenario in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UnitTests.CodeGen.CodeGenTupleTests.HugeTupleCreationParses unit-test #39976
  • "Go To Implementation" doesn't find all implementations #66008
    17.8 P4
  • Find all references on generated file yields no results #69270
    17.8 P2
  • Don't offer non-abstract and non-virtual statics after type parameter #64733
    18.0
  • The code coloring is wrong #69660
  • InvalidOperationException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindOutVariableDeclarationArgument #66806
    17.8
  • Tracking issue for analyzers/fixers to convert existing code to collection expressions. #69132
    17.8 P3
  • "Make member readonly" is offered even in cases where it silently changes behavior #69645
    Backlog
  • Generic name angle brackets #27236
    Backlog
  • Disable warning wave like CS8981 via #pragma #69657
  • Collapse to definitions ( CTRL + M + O ) should collapse local functions #68513
    Backlog
  • "error CS9027: Unexpected keyword 'unchecked'" is reported for cref syntax #69142
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34021.281 #69652
  • C# editor: A method can not be collapsed #68778
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Stabilize LongInitializers test #69666
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Offer 'use implicit object' in a few more apparent locations #69651
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix CSharpSyntaxContext when dealing with UTF8 string literals #69650
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Find symbols defined in a source-generated compilation in the originating compilation #69642
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update versions in NuGet-packages.md #69665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out captured primary constructor parameters from completion lists. #69647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump NuGet version used by tests #69662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use different valid modifiers for different type declaration snippets #69653
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Fix completion for static-abstracts on type parameters #69664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Add locals to binder from out vars in array rank specifiers on local functions #69597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where errant comments were preventing code collapsing #69644
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow collapsing local function definitions if desired by user #69646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Report misplaced unchecked in cref as warning #69609
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add ctor to Stack Trace Explorer #69630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 P2 #69260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update rule ID for 'Unnecessary call to Set.Contains' #69282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, 17.8
  • Update doc for IsRecord #69607
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only use keyed services when keyed service provider is available #50277
    8.0-rc2
  • Add docs for anti-forgery and form updates in minimal API #50275
    8.0-rc2
  • AddAuthentication with JwtBearerScheme and IConfigureOptions doesn't work #50274
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #50270
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50269
  • PageTitle doesn't display for SSR pages in mixed render mode app #50268
  • Make the PageTitle-component able to be set with prerendering turned off #50267
  • Blazor SSR chooses RemoteNavigationManager or HttpNavigationManager unpredictably #50260
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NativeAOT with reflection disabled working in .NET 7, not in .NET 8 for new KestrelServer #50255
  • Parallel JS -> .NET byte arrays retrieval fails #50254
    Backlog
  • Multipart body length limit 16384 exceeded in NET CORE #50252

Closed

  • WASM IndexOutOfRangeException inside RenderTreeDiffBuilder.AppendAttributeDiffEntriesForRange #49192
    8.0-rc2
  • Support account lockout with identity endpoints #47232
    8.0-preview7
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson on ApplicationParts #50271
  • [.NET 8 Preview 7] PageTitle doesn't update when disabling Prerendering using Blazor Web App #50209
  • RenderModeSSR #50206
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB3027 Could not copy "E:\15. Code Learning\Learning\Core.Application\bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll" to "bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll". Exceeded retry count of 10. Failed. The file is locked by: ".NET Host (4176)" Presentation.MVC d:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Preview\MSBuild\Current\Bin\amd64\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4879 #50200
  • Storybook Support #50262
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET http logging middleware #48667
    8.0
  • RateLimiter is not working if I use IHost/IHostBuilder #50244
  • SSR EditForm in .NET 8 Preview 7 not firing validation? #50256
  • Perf regression: endpoint #50216

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #50276
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove reflection from KestrelServer constructor #50272
    area-runtime
  • Ensure enhanced nav requests have the correct headers #50263
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix SSR redirection when coming from a non-root URL #50261
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • In SSR, supply HttpContext as cascading value #50253
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Use polling to watch certificate paths #50251
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50265
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix IndexOutOfRangeException when an added/removed attribute spans a buffer size boundary #50110
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Add benchmarks for RDG #50266
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Update to tough-cookie@4.1.3 in repo #50264
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50234
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50222
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Resolve interceptor location using identifier name #50245
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Test updating SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #50278
    area-infrastructure
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-runtime, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2249980 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-runtime, area-routing
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please document CorGCReferenceType::CorHandleWeakWinRT #4171
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync eng/native from dotnet/runtime #4178
  • Changing CreateCoreDbgRemotePort signature replace LPCSTR with LPCWSTR #4176

Merged

  • Workaround dotnet-install.ps1 issue #4179

Updated

  • Add the "crashinfo" command for NativeAOT. #4125
  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the !ThreadPool command when using the Windows thread pool #4160

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App crashes with GetRoute NRE when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes #16940
  • FlyoutPage is not scrollable in MacCatalyst #16938
  • Extend KeyboardAccelerator to all controls #16936
    Backlog
  • I'm encountering issues while using databases like MySQL and MSSQL when running my project on a mobile device. #16934
  • App crashes with ArgumentOutOfRangeException when FlyoutItemIsVisible changes (WinUI only) #16929
    Backlog
  • Shell: Cannot open shell flyout when initial page has Navbar hidden (NavBarIsVisible="False") - Android #16927
  • [regression/not fixed in 8.0.0-rc.1.9012] Binding Issue: Multiple platform CheckBox control 'IsChecked' #16926
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Intermittent "Font not found" crash when temporary location is cleared during runtime #16923
  • [WinUI] Shadows shape is wrong when using clipped image #16922
  • [iOS]Image downscaling makes image layout inconsistent on IOS when compared to Android and non downscaled images #16921
  • Viquloc #16920
  • Handler not set on MAUI Shapes #16919
  • ImageButton is not properly anti-aliased when scaled down #16918
  • The placeholder is displayed incorrectly on iOS and MacCatalyst #16916
    .NET 8 GA
  • Unable to create a maui (v7) app on windows and target iOS #16915
  • Layout issue with Grid columns #16913
  • [iOS] Label's width can't full fill Grid's * (GridUnitType.Star) space when Grid has a Horizontal padding #16912
  • [Windows] ListView cannot bind to ObservableCollection<System.Type> #16911
  • [regression/8.0.0] - RefreshView does not hide spinner when IsRefreshing set to false. #16910
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - Shared ResourceDictionary Styles prevents app from building in android #16908
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Grid RowDefinition height taking precedence over actual Height constraints #16935
  • [8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] DeviceSensors produce an ANR at irregular intervals when built in Release mode. #15829
  • [Bug] Keyboard Bugs and Xamarin.Forms migration concerns #11703
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add TextInput property so users can enable/disable if they want tapping outside on an input field to close the keyboard #12003
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] Unable to use a custom splash screen #16843
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] - WinUI shadows are broken #16094
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI appicon and splash not updating on physical device IPhone 13 - iOS version 16.5.1 #16731
  • SVG file is not converting to PNG properly. #12658
    Backlog
  • SVG Font-family does not apply after convert to png(Splash screen) #16399
  • iOS Simulator not showing up - Log ends with "Deploy: succeeded" #16914
  • [Android] WindowOvelay painting is not working with shell #10781
    Under Consideration
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_ScreenReader: Voice over is not announcing label information for slider, increase or decrease button. #15621
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView with BindableLayout.ItemsSource is not recalculate new size on iOS #12727
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.81] ScrollView content with Buttons rendered offscreen do not respond on iOS #14624
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView with dynamically added Entries are not clickable #15762
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix so updating FlyoutItemIsVisible hides/shows shell menu item #16942
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
  • [UITest] Add a timeout to the appium server startup #16939
    area/testing
  • [workload] Only install the WinUI pack on Windows #16937
    area/setup 🪄
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    .NET 8 GA
  • Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    community ✨
  • [uitests] Bump versions and fix script #16917

Merged

  • Improve VisualElement API Docs Follow-up #16933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    t/breaking 💥, area/keyboard, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 8 GA
  • Update VisualElement docs #16754
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Improve the control over resource generation #16845
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16907
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Update shadow mask as part of shadow properties #16895
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fail the build before it even starts #16906
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #16902
  • Fix support for VisualDiagnosticsOverlay/IWindowOverlay on Android Shell Apps #16138
    platform/android 🤖, area/tooling ⚙️, area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Updates for dotnet/runtime #16904
    .NET 8 GA
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Handlers should not implement `IImageSourcePartSetter` directly #16901
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    partner/cat 😻, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
